definition: Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: What kind of Gundam story are you aiming for?
sentences.chinese: 你想做一个什么样的高达故事？

sentences.english: Some investors even raked in up to 40 percent in profits.
sentences.chinese: 一些投资者甚至迅速赚得高达40%的利润。

sentences.english: This allows you to borrow up to 25% more than its appraised value.
sentences.chinese: 这让你借取高达25%以上的鉴定价值。

sentences.english: That puts the stock on a still-heady multiple of 23 times earnings.
sentences.chinese: 以这一股价折算的雅虎预期市盈率仍然高达23倍。

sentences.english: Some drivers charge as much as ten times the legal fare .
sentences.chinese: 有些司机索取的车资高达原法定车资的十倍。

sentences.english: The average city-dwelling American sees up to 5, 000 advertisements a day.
sentences.chinese: 美国城市居民平均每天看到得广告高达5000条。

sentences.english: Lofty figs are tall evergreen trees, reaching 35 metres in height.
sentences.chinese: 高山榕树为高大常绿乔木，可高达35米。

sentences.english: Using back seat belts reduce casualties in fatal accidents up to 75%.
sentences.chinese: 使用安全带可以减少高达75%事故伤亡率。

sentences.english: Furthermore, brown bear populations have dropped as much as 50 percent in the last 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 此外，过去15年中，棕熊种群数量下降高达50%。

sentences.english: Some informed estimates place Iraqi civilian casualities at over 600,000.
sentences.chinese: 有些知情者估计伊拉克死亡市民人数高达60万以上。
硬度高达约人权委员会70。

sentences.english: You can play up to 30 games simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 你可以同时进行高达30个个游戏。

sentences.english: The treatment costs more than $16, 000 a month.
sentences.chinese: 每个月的治疗费高达16000美元。

sentences.english: One of the cooperative’s farmers is 83.
sentences.chinese: 一个参加合作生活组织的老农年龄高达83岁。

sentences.english: That is why the price of a pound is outrages $300 or more.
sentences.chinese: 这也是为什么一磅的价格要高达300多美元的原因。

sentences.english: The underside of this inchworm measures your baby up to 24 inches.
sentences.chinese: 这尺蠖的底面措施宝宝高达24英寸。

definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
up to/no less than/as much as
second only to.../(in second place) preceded only by...
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
